techmeme.title: Harvey, which is building an AI-powered "copilot" for lawyers, raised a $100M Series C led by GV that values it at $1.5B and brings its total funding to $206M (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
dYdX, which is reportedly exploring a sale, says v3, an older version of its DeFi crypto exchange that averages ~$1.5B/week in derivates trading, was hacked (Danny Nelson/CoinDesk)
A staffer at Activision Blizzard, which had layoffs in 2024 affecting many 2D artists, says some remaining artists were "forced to use AI to aid in their work" (Brian Merchant/Wired)
Mark Zuckerberg argues "open source AI" is the path forward, that closed models are vulnerable to vendor lock-in, state-backed espionage, and more (Mark Zuckerberg/Meta)
Meta plans to roll out its AI assistant to Quest in August, limited to US and Canada users in experimental mode, after first coming to Ray-Ban smart glasses (Mariella Moon/Engadget)
